titleStmt.title: Antichrist, that is to saye: A true reporte, that Antichriste is come wher he was borne, of his persone, miracles, what tooles he worketh withall, and what shalbe his ende: translated out of Latine into Englishe. by I.O.
Antichristus. English
titleStmt.author: Gwalther, Rudolf, 1519-1586.

titleStmt.title: Antichrist, that is to saye: A true reporte, that Antichriste is come wher he was borne, of his persone, miracles, what tooles he worketh withall, and what shalbe his ende: translated out of Latine into Englishe. by I.O.
Antichristus. English
titleStmt.author: Gwalther, Rudolf, 1519-1586.
Old, John, fl. 1545-1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christophor Trutheall [i.e. Egidius van der Erve] Cum priuilegio regali,

notesStmt.note: On A2v: Antichrist. That is to saye, fyue homilies, wherin it is proued, that the Bishoppe of Rome is the ryght and myghtye houge Antichrist .. set furthe by Rodulphe Gualter of Zuirik. &c.
The imprint is false; in fact printed in Emden by Egidius van der Erve (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Christophor Trutheall [i.e. Egidius van der Erve]
